Package myMath

Class Monom

  • java.lang.Object
    • myMath.Monom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    function
    public class Monom
extends java.lang.Object
implements function
    This class represents a simple "Monom" of shape a*x^b, where a is a real number and a is an integer (summed a none negative), see: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monomial The class implements function and support simple operations as: construction, value at x, derivative, add and multiply.
    Author:
    OrShemesh && YaaraGoldenberg;

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Monom​(double a, int b)
      This Monom constructor gets 2 variables the first is Double for the coefficient and the second Integer is for the power
      Monom​(java.lang.String str)
      This constructor gets String and turns it into Monom Example : 2x^2 , x , -5 , x^2 , 6*x ...
      Monom​(Monom ot)
      This is copy constructor of Monom.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void add​(Monom m)
      This function get Monom and if the power of the Monom is equal to the power the second Monom it's (+)add them.
      void derivative()
      This function is calculation the derivative of this Monom example :f(x)=2x^3--->f(x)'=6x^2
      boolean equals​(Monom m)
      This function get Monom and checking if there equals example : f(x1)=2x^3 !
      double f​(double x)
      This function represents a simple function of type y=f(x), where both y and x are real numbers.
      double get_coefficient()
      function get coefficient.
      int get_power()
      function get power.
      void multiply​(Monom m1)
      This function get Monom and multiply the coefficient and add power example :2x^2*3x^2=6x^4
      void substract​(Monom m)
      This function get Monom and if the power of the Monom is equal to the power the second Monom it's (-)sub them.
      java.lang.String toString()
      This function print the Monom

      • add

        public void add​(Monom m)
        This function get Monom and if the power of the Monom is equal to the power the second Monom it's (+)add them. example :2x^2+3x^2=5x^2
        Parameters:
        m -

      • substract

        public void substract​(Monom m)
        This function get Monom and if the power of the Monom is equal to the power the second Monom it's (-)sub them. example :2x^2-3x^2=-1x^2
        Parameters:
        m -

      • multiply

        public void multiply​(Monom m1)
        This function get Monom and multiply the coefficient and add power example :2x^2*3x^2=6x^4
        Parameters:
        m -

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(Monom m)
        This function get Monom and checking if there equals example : f(x1)=2x^3 != f(x2)=6x^2 return false
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true or false
